fi.tuni.tiko.hud

Class HudSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • fi.tuni.tiko.ImprovedSprite
          • fi.tuni.tiko.hud.HudSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HudElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, HelpPopOutMenu, TowerImprovementPopOutMenu, TowerSelectionPopOutMenu, WaveClearedPopOutMenu

    public class HudSprite
extends ImprovedSprite
implements HudElement
    Adds all the functionalities to ImprovedSprite, specific to HudElements Implements HudElement to add generic implementations of HudElement methods
